channel.title: TooManyItems mod
channel.description: I tried installing the toomanyitems mod but it wouldn't work. When I installed modloader, it said "invalid or corrupt jarfile" then it showed the location of the jar file which was c:\users\owner\appdata\roaming\.minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar

item.title: TooManyItems mod
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

triston001:

make sure to transfer the small files in the folder too, not the whole folder itself. btw, tmi doesnt require modloader. make sure ur mod is also the same version as urs. like 1.1, 1.8.1, 1.7.3, etc

item.title: TooManyItems mod
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

Nonamee:

I tried installing the toomanyitems mod but it wouldn’t work. When I installed modloader, it said “invalid or corrupt jarfile” then it showed the location of the jar file which was c:\users\owner\appdata\roaming.minecraft\bin\minecraft.jar

Okay i no what is rong download this program called winrar
Then after that r’Right click’ on minecraft.jar go open with winrar
Put everything in there and delete meta info Then it should work

http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm Dont no what system u run but thats still a list of all of them

Read full topic
